mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.* FROM sys_menu AS sm INNER JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON srm.role_id = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_conn AS surc ON sr.id = surc.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_group_role AS sgr ON sr.id = sgr.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_group AS sug ON sgr.group_id = sug.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_group_conn AS sugc ON sug.id = sugc.group_id WHERE sugc.user_id = #{uid} OR surc.user_id = #{uid} ORDER BY sys_menu_order ASC
